summary: Minor increase to Deadly Aim now x6, improvement over x3
descriptionHtml:
With Dawnguard we finally got a chance to play with crossbows, and while they are amazing and powerful I have always felt that Deadly Aim in the Sneak tree was very underpowered, this prompted me to tweak its damage ever so slightly. I found x3 was an insult to archery, as the daggers to x15 and then swords do x6 and while this averages out well for both the blades weapons I find it leaves the bow lacking severely.
I felt a x6 damage output made more sense, its not overpowered and after all, it is a bolt/arrow, tipped with metal, traveling a speed and piercing armor.
Anyway, this mod increases just that single stat, it does NOT require Dawnguard and only Skyrim and Update enabled.
author: Edg3
